https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4Amwhc4EhZlrKTxVSto30cDVtng.jpg A “yes-man” taxi driver tries to take revenge and regain control of his fate. However, it is fate who plays a joke on him instead. On this absurd day, a psychological rollercoaster awaits. A Taxi Driver
